suggest.amasty/product-attachment-api: Install product-attachment-api module to activate Product Attachment Api.
suggest.amasty/module-product-attachments-graphq: We recommend to install Product Attachments GraphQL module if you use Magento 2.3.7+.
suggest.amasty/module-product-attachment-mftf-3: Install module-product-attachment-mftf-3 module to be able to run Product Attachments MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.1+ version.
